name: Farewell Avalon
storyline:
Archie is a newly-born archling in a world he once found familiar.
Help guide him through the Avalonian ruins to help find his lost memories.

However, roaming these halls old sentinels of the Avalonian people: Cariburns.
These machines, now corrupted by a mysterious energy, have turned their sights onto their own creators.
But don't be afraid to fight, for if you get hurt, there will always have someone by your side.
summary:
Farewell Avalon is a top-down combat game with a unique twist to "death" and a deep storyline in a world unlike before.
Explore the ruins of Outpost 7 as you uncover the mysterious past of Archie and the Avalonian people. And alongside your journey, The Skribble will protect you through, no matter what.
